      • updateMaterialData

        public void updateMaterialData(int item_id,
                               String item_description,
                               float width,
                               float height,
                               String entity,
                               String materialtype,
                               float price,
                               int quantity)
                        throws MaterialSampleException,
                               ClassNotFoundException
        This method updates an item with the given item_id. All values given the method as parameter replaces the data in the db, even values that are empty, except the quantity, it will only be updated if it is higher or lower than 0.
        Specified by:
        updateMaterialData in class MaterialMapper
